com.nxp.id.jcopx
Class IOControlX

java.lang.Object
  com.nxp.id.jcopx.IOControlX

public final class IOControlX
extends java.lang.Object

Class to control the IO resources from a Java Card applet

Field Summary

          Identifier to indicate exceptions in the C-layer implementation

          configuration value to set the pin to act as 'open collector', to be used in a setIOConfig(byte, byte) call.

Method Detail

setIO

public static void setIO(byte id,
                         byte value)
                  throws IOControlException
Set the IO level of identified pin to given value.

Parameters:
id - of the pin to set the value for
value - to be set on the pin
Throws:
IOControlException - with reason codes
  • IOControlException.INVALID_VALUE in case an invalid value has been given.
  • IOControlException.INVALID_IO_ID in case an invalid pin identifier has been given.

getIO

public static byte getIO(byte id)
                  throws IOControlException
Get the current pin value.
Example: 
 
     ...
     // Get the current pin value from IO Pin 1
     byte pinValue = IOControlX.getIO( IOControlX.IOID_P1 );
     
     // Do something with the pin value
     ...

Parameters:
id - of the pin to get the value for. Only the pin identifier from this class are allowed.
Returns:
byte
Throws:
IOControlException - with reason codes
  • IOControlException.INVALID_IO_ID in case an invalid pin identifier has been given.

setIOConfig

public static void setIOConfig(byte id,
                               byte value)
                        throws IOControlException
Set the IO configuration of the identified pin to given value.

Parameters:
id - of the pin to set the value for
value - to be configured on the pin
Throws:
IOControlException - with reason codes
  • IOControlException.INVALID_VALUE in case an invalid value has been given.
  • IOControlException.INVALID_IO_ID in case an invalid pin identifier has been given.
